'''Fowl''' is a [[Cooking Ingredient]] item used in recipes to create [[Food]] items.

==How to Obtain==
Fowl is dropped upon death by the wild [[Wildlife#Birds|birds]] found around [[Teyvat]]. The amount varies according to the animal's size.

See the Video Guides section or the '''[https://webstatic-sea.mihoyo.com/app/ys-map-sea/index.html#/map/2?shown_types=123 Teyvat Interactive Map]''' for some specific locations where animals dropping Fowl can be found.

Fowl can also be dropped by destructible crates, barrels and pots found all over [[Teyvat]] as well as by some [[Chests]], and can also be obtained by completing [[Expeditions]] in Windrise (Mondstadt) or Musoujin Gorge (Inazuma)
